LanguageData.BB_BarnOwl.label: barn owl
LanguageData.BB_BarnOwl.description: A medium-sized owl with a distinctive, heart-shaped face. They are renowned for their eerie, drawn-out shrieking calls. Barn owls prey upon small mammals which they locate with their excellent hearing.
LanguageData.BB_BarnOwl.tools.talons.label: talons
LanguageData.BB_BarnOwl.tools.beak.label: beak
LanguageData.BB_BarnOwl.tools.head.label: head
